Package data

Class C_ReadRaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.C_ReadRaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_ConstantString
    public class C_ReadRaster
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_ConstantString
    Two utilities to read either an ASCII or bitmap raster and return a grid in SimMasto format (the image must be in grey levels or in 256 or less)
    Author:
    Quentin Baduel, 2008, rev. JLF 10.2015
    See Also:
    C_Landscape

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static int[][] imgRasterLoader​(java.lang.String url)
      Downloads grid in raster image with its related colormodel this function should be modified in order to read the data type contained in the raster.
      static int[][] txtRasterLoader​(java.lang.String url)
      Downloads grid in ASCII text format : 1st line "DSAA" 2nd line number of rows 3rd line number of columns 4th line min and max values remaining: line 0: column 0 to j-1 (delimiter blank space) line i line i-1

      • txtRasterLoader

        public static int[][] txtRasterLoader​(java.lang.String url)
        Downloads grid in ASCII text format : 1st line "DSAA" 2nd line number of rows 3rd line number of columns 4th line min and max values remaining: line 0: column 0 to j-1 (delimiter blank space) line i line i-1
        Parameters:
        url -
        Returns:
        matrix of affinities (or whatever)

      • imgRasterLoader

        public static int[][] imgRasterLoader​(java.lang.String url)
        Downloads grid in raster image with its related colormodel this function should be modified in order to read the data type contained in the raster. For now, we read a png image which contain int value in a byte array for each pixel
